name: IDEN
description: IDEN is a new concept mobile business card service.  No need to keep paper business cards into a file box anymore. No hassle to scan and store business cards.  In IDEN, you can give only the information you want to give to others. In IDEN, when you update your information, the updated information will be automatically delivered to others. In IDEN, when you disconnect from a person, the IDEN card you exchanged with the person will also be disappeared. No need to fill out the personal information on your address book. No worry for keeping updated the information. In IDEN, you can share not only your phone numbers and email addresses but also the direct links of social apps such as Facebook Messenger, Instagram, Twitter, and Snapchat. In IDEN, you can create 5 ~ 20 cards for each purpose to share with others.  Enjoy your smart IDEN life!
